function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for more exterior spaces and improved ventilation due to fears of contagion in closed indoor spaces.","Impact":"Inadequate reduce the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, outdoor air purifiers, and air quality monitoring systems.","People":"General public, occupants of indoor spaces, service industry workers, and students in schools.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and government authorities."},{"Description":"Interior spaces heavily regulated by codes and laws that may not align with COVID-19 safety recommendations.","Impact":"Inadequate adherence to COVID-19 safety recommendations and increased risk of disease transmission in indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Reviewing and updating building codes and laws to align with COVID-19 safety recommendations, and implementing additional safety measures in interior spaces.","Technologies":"Sensor-based occupancy monitoring systems, antimicrobial surface coatings, and UV-C disinfection devices.","People":"Architects, interior designers, building code officials, physical barriers, flexible furniture systems.","People":"Facility managers, interior designers, and building owners.","Owner":"Facility managers, interior design firms, and building owners."}]}
